author: Gus_263
title: Onewa turned in hordika
review: Onewa is one of my favorite sets, because of your color, mask, story and weapons. Onewa Hordika too, the same colors and the claw clubs like very much the proto pitons. The rhotuka spinner is cool to shot, but it flyes very, and can be losted easily. The all Hordika have gears in one arm, and like action figures. I rate Onewa Hordika 5/5.

author: SaintElsewhere
title: The best of the Hordika, says I.
review: Onewa has always been one of my favourite Toa, be he Metru or Hordika. My favourite part of the Hordika version is that it is not too different from the Metu version. His mask is still slightly similar, his eyes are the same colour, and his clubs are very much like the proto-pitons on the Metru version. Also, the Rhotuka spinners have always been my favourite launchers next to the Zamor spheres of 2006.

author: Carl
title: Great weapons
review:
Where do I begin??? This guy is bursting with AWESOMENESS! Toa Metru Onewa was my fourth favourite Toa Metru, but Hordika Onewa is my favourite Hordika! Amazing how things change for the better, isn't it?

Pros:
Weapons are awesome
Hordika chest-plate
Hordika limbs
Hordika limbs
Weapons are awesome
Rhotuka spinner
Swivelling arm mechanism
Weapons are awesome
Mask is great
Good set for MOCing
Did I mention that the weapons are awesome?

Cons:
NONE!

Hordika Onewa is awesome and I was sad to see him cured back to Toa Metru in the movie, but that is only a movie. You can always make up the REAL story (in which Hordika Nokama turns evil and gets a Vezon cape and kills Vakama, Nuju and Whenua and it is up to Onewa and Matau to stop her and her 5 Visorak - she kicked the black Visorak of a waterfal where he was eaten by Keetongu)

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Toa Hordika) - Toa Hordika Onewa Review
review:
This is a nice figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has 32 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 48 pieces and it was 9 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was 19 cents per piece which is a good value for a set like this.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to complain about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8739-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands, the legs, the feet and the head can be moved. On both hands we can see a weapon and on one arm we can also see a gear which you can use to move that arm up and/or down. On the back of the torso is a spinner which flies very well as well.

Summary


All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
